title: Shakespeare: The World as Stage
description: The Illustrated Edition is an exquisitely illustrated, updated edition of Bill Brysonâ€™s bestselling biography of William Shakespeare that takes the reader on an enthralling tour through Elizabethan England and the eccentricities of Shakespearean scholarship. With more than 100 color and black-and-white illustrations throughout, and updated to include recent discoveries, The Illustrated Edition evokes the superstitions, academic discoveries, and myths surrounding the life of one of the greatest poets, and makes sense of the man behind the masterpieces.
author: Bill Bryson
